articles.description: The mum-of-six, 32, formally registered the new company last week to manage book deals and other merchandising, according to The Mirror.
articles.content:
Paris Fury has reportedly quit her husband Tyson's £40million boxing firm to create her own business.
The mum-of-six, 32, formally registered the new company last week to manage book deals and other… [+2584 chars]
